data.name: Domina - Ludus Expansion: Hall of Heroes
data.detailed_description:
Oh Brotherus Where Art Thou?

Well if he died he's pretty much dead... but if he was training in the HALL OF HEROES he could be revived!

Have you got a high-ranking gladiator who you'd just hate to lose? And then what happens? You lose him, right? Every dang time! The arena is merciless!

Well, FRET NO MORE! Have your Architect Emeritus build one of these here Halls of Heroes (*taps hood*) and a fallen gladiator can be revived with a bit of time / effort / and Haruspex!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Sound Card: Yes
